title: How-To: How to Compare and Alert Historical Ingest
description:
Compares current ingest volume against historical baselines to detect drops or spikes in logging,
and builds scheduled searches or alerts when current ingest deviates from normal.

examples.name: Alert on low ingest volume
examples.description: Calculates daily event counts and flags if today is significantly lower than the 30-day average.
examples.query:
| timechart(function=count(), span=1d)
| avg_30d := avg(value, window=30)
| drop_ratio := value / avg_30d
| drop_ratio < 0.5
